verses.text: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*; thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* have they \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*; they have \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* on \w heaps|strong="H5856"\w*.\f + \fr 79.1 \ft of: or, for\f*

The dead \w bodies|strong="H5038"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* have they \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add to be\add* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* unto the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of thy \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* unto the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* have they \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* like \w water|strong="H4325"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and \add there was\add* none to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \add them\add*.

We are become a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* to our \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, a \w scorn|strong="H3933"\w* and \w derision|strong="H7047"\w* to them that are round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* us.

How long, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? wilt thou be \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? shall thy \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*?

Pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* upon the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* thee, and upon the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* that have not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
For they have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and laid \w waste|strong="H8074"\w* his dwelling \w place|strong="H5116"\w*.

O \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* not against us \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*: let thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w speedily|strong="H4118"\w* \w prevent|strong="H6923"\w* us: for we are \w brought|strong="H1809"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w low|strong="H1809"\w*.\f + \fr 79.8 \ft former…: or, the iniquities of them that were before us\f*

\w Help|strong="H5826"\w* us, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, \w for|strong="H1697"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us, and purge \w away|strong="H3722"\w* our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, for thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake.

Wherefore should the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Where \add is\add* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? let him be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* in our \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \add by\add* the \w revenging|strong="H5360"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \add which is\add* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w*.\f + \fr 79.10 \ft revenging: Heb. vengeance\f*

Let the \w sighing|strong="H0603"\w* of the \w prisoner|strong="H0615"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; according to the \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w* of thy \w power|strong="H2220"\w* \w preserve|strong="H3498"\w* thou those that are \w appointed|strong="H1121"\w* to \w die|strong="H8546"\w*;\f + \fr 79.11 \ft thy…: Heb. thine arm\f*\f + \fr 79.11 \ft preserve…: Heb. reserve the children of death\f*

And \w render|strong="H7725"\w* unto our \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w* \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w* into their \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* their \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, wherewith they have \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*.

So we thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* of thy \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w* will give thee \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: we will shew \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* to \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 79.13 \ft to all…: Heb. to generation and generation\f*
